detail_desc: Long jacket in a soft weave with notch lapels, flap welt front pockets, a gently tapered waist and long sleeves. No fasteners. Lined.
Long jacket in a soft weave with notch lapels, flap welt front pockets, a gently tapered waist and long sleeves. No fasteners. Lined.
Long jacket in a soft weave with notch lapels, flap welt front pockets, a gently tapered waist and long sleeves. No fasteners. Lined.
Long jacket in a soft weave with notch lapels, flap welt front pockets, a gently tapered waist and long sleeves. No fasteners. Lined.

Double-breasted pea coat in woven fabric with wide notch lapels and a buttonhole. Side pockets, two inner pockets, an adjustable tab and button at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Recycled polyester lining.

Double-breasted pea coat in woven fabric with wide notch lapels and a buttonhole. Side pockets, two inner pockets, an adjustable tab and button at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Recycled polyester lining.

Double-breasted pea coat in woven fabric with wide notch lapels and a buttonhole. Side pockets, two inner pockets, an adjustable tab and button at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Recycled polyester lining.

Double-breasted pea coat in woven fabric with wide notch lapels and a buttonhole. Side pockets, two inner pockets, an adjustable tab and button at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Recycled polyester lining.

Double-breasted pea coat in woven fabric with wide notch lapels and a buttonhole. Side pockets, two inner pockets, an adjustable tab and button at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Recycled polyester lining.
Fully lined lace swimsuit with a V-neck, padded cups with removable inserts and spaghetti shoulder straps that cross and tie at the back. Open at the sides and back.
Jacket in soft pile with a high collar, large patch front pockets and a zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front. Lined. The jacket is made partly from recycled polyester.
Jacket in soft pile with a high collar, large patch front pockets and a zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front. Lined. The jacket is made partly from recycled polyester.

Set with a dungaree dress and top in soft cotton jersey. Dress with a print motif and appliqués on the front and straps that cross and have adjustable fastenings at the back. Gathered seam at the top, elastication at the back of the waist and patch front pockets. Top with an all-over print, concealed press-stud on one shoulder and long sleeves.
Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of leggings in soft cotton jersey with a glitter print. Top with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder. Leggings with an elasticated waist.
Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of leggings in soft cotton jersey with a glitter print. Top with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder. Leggings with an elasticated waist.
Fitted, calf-length dress in a soft rib knit with a V-neck, buttons down the front, long sleeves and a detachable tie belt at the waist.

Dungarees and a top in soft jersey. Dungarees with elastication at the back of the waist, shoulder straps with adjustable buttoning,and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Top with long sleeves and a concealed press-stud on one shoulder.

Dungarees and a top in soft jersey. Dungarees with elastication at the back of the waist, shoulder straps with adjustable buttoning,and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Top with long sleeves and a concealed press-stud on one shoulder.

Dungarees and a top in soft jersey. Dungarees with elastication at the back of the waist, shoulder straps with adjustable buttoning,and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Top with long sleeves and a concealed press-stud on one shoulder.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with embroidery on the front, long sleeves and a press-stud on one shoulder. Ribbing around the neckline and cuffs, and slits at the sides. Soft brushed inside.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with embroidery on the front, long sleeves and a press-stud on one shoulder. Ribbing around the neckline and cuffs, and slits at the sides. Soft brushed inside.
V-neck body in jersey crêpe with a low-cut back, narrow shoulder straps and concealed press-studs at the crotch.
V-neck body in jersey crêpe with a low-cut back, narrow shoulder straps and concealed press-studs at the crotch.
V-neck body in jersey crêpe with a low-cut back, narrow shoulder straps and concealed press-studs at the crotch.
V-neck body in jersey crêpe with a low-cut back, narrow shoulder straps and concealed press-studs at the crotch.
V-neck body in jersey crêpe with a low-cut back, narrow shoulder straps and concealed press-studs at the crotch.

Pile-lined parka in a cotton weave with padded sleeves, a stand-up collar and pile-lined hood with a detachable faux-fur trim. Zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front, and a drawstring at the waist and hem. Flap front pockets with a press-stud and a concealed pocket behind with a press-stud at the top. Elasticated tab with a concealed press-stud at the cuffs, and a small back vent. Lined.

Zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front, and a drawstring at the waist and hem. Flap front pockets with a press-stud and a concealed pocket behind with a press-stud at the top. Elasticated tab with a concealed press-stud at the cuffs, and a small back vent. Lined.

Straight-cut blouse in soft silk with buttons at the top and a knot detail that adds life and texture to the front. Seam at the hips, long sleeves with a pleat, wide cuffs with a slit and button, and a rounded hem.

Straight-cut blouse in soft silk with buttons at the top and a knot detail that adds life and texture to the front. Seam at the hips, long sleeves with a pleat, wide cuffs with a slit and button, and a rounded hem.
Short, straight-cut dress in sequin-embroidered mesh with spaghetti shoulder straps. Jersey lining.

Shirt in softly draping viscose twill with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Flap chest pockets, a seam with a drawstring under the bust and long sleeves with a tab and button and buttoned cuffs. Rounded hem.

Cap with a mesh back, a lightly padded front with an appliqué, and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Gloves in a soft, fine knit with ribbed cuffs.

Shirt in woven fabric with an easy-iron finish. Turn-down collar, classic front and darts and a yoke at the back. Long sleeves, narrow cuffs with adjustable buttoning, and a rounded hem. Slim Fit – a fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.

Soft, non-wired bra in lace with narrow crossover elastic straps at the front and cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Warm-lined Chelsea boots in imitation leather with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the front and back. Pile linings and insoles and chunky trainer soles.
Warm-lined Chelsea boots in imitation leather with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the front and back. Pile linings and insoles and chunky trainer soles.
Biker jacket in imitation leather with a diagonal zip down the front and notch lapels with decorative press-studs. Quilted sections at the sides and cuffs, and zipped side pockets. Lined.

Short dress in airy chiffon with an embroidered pattern, a small, frilled collar with ties at the front and an opening at the top. Gathers at the shoulders, long sleeves and wide cuffs with covered buttons and a short frill trim. Gathered seam at the waist and a flounce at the hem. Jersey lining.
Hi tops in imitation leather with imitation suede sections, a padded shaft, boot lacing and a crocodile-patterned imitation leather loop. Soft pile linings, mesh insoles and chunky soles.
Sleeveless top in satin with a layer of sequin-embroidered mesh over the front. Back in a viscose weave with buttons at the back of the neck.
Sleeveless top in satin with a layer of sequin-embroidered mesh over the front. Back in a viscose weave with buttons at the back of the neck.
